thread.section_title: White Mountain Puzzles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White Mountain Puzzles | whitemountainpuzzles.com | 4 of 174
thread.title: Branda Turner
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Branda Turner

author: Branda Turner
title: Branda Turner
text: I recently bought a puzzle that was less than par. The picture was peeling off the cardboard on about 1/4 of the pieces. I emailed customer service about it and received prompt and immediate action on the issue. I appreciate those willingness to fix the problem. I look forward to buying more puzzles from WM. Thanks guys
